dimension:
27 x 14 1/2 in. (68.58 x 36.83 cm) (at waist)
36 in. (91.44 cm) (object part, ties)
title: Apron
description: bib and waist band totally embroidered in abstract floral design; bib in light green with pink; waist band in orange and red; skirt part shirred green with black; skirt bound on sides with flower embroidered on purple tape; patched-up neck loop; woven tied with tassels; apron bib lined in batik; blue and printed fabric
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
